memberdef.argsstring: (const riscv_fir_lattice_instance_q31 *S, const q31_t *pSrc, q31_t *pDst, uint32_t blockSize)
memberdef.name: riscv_fir_lattice_q31

briefdescription.para: Processing function for the Q31 FIR lattice filter.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the Q31 FIR lattice structure
points to the block of input data
points to the block of output data

simplesect.title: Scaling and Overflow Behavior
simplesect.para: In order to avoid overflows the input signal must be scaled down by 2*log2(numStages) bits.
